# Messages.ToStringBuilder method

Returns a new StringBuilder with the messages text

```csharp
public StringBuilder ToStringBuilder(bool asAppendLine = true)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| asAppendLine | Indicates whether a carriage return must be added between the messages in the collection. |

## Return Value

A StringBuilder reference with messages text.
